leftColumn.description: Vertical list of 11 industry category links

itemBehavior.hover: highlights category, shows corresponding right-panel content

itemStructure.note: Each category item uses a promotional background image via CSS background-image on an anchor with .image.dark-overlay class

rightColumn.description: Context-sensitive panel that changes based on hovered left-column category
rightColumn.defaultContent: Promotional image card for the hovered category
rightColumn.deepNestedNote: Only Refining Technologies has deep nested sub-groups (4 content groups + promo card). All other categories show a simple promotional image card.

overlay.note: Semi-transparent dark overlay behind the panel covering page content

animation.note: No slide or fade animation observed; simple CSS display toggle

notes: Industries megamenu is the only megamenu-style dropdown; other nav items use simple dropdowns
Panel is 1240px wide, ~507px tall, positioned below main nav bar
Light gray background (rgb(230, 231, 232)) for the panel
Left column has 11 industry categories, each with a promotional background image and dark overlay
Right column shows sub-categories for Refining Technologies (4 groups + promo card) or a promotional image card for all other categories
Hovering a left-column category swaps the right-column content
Semi-transparent dark overlay covers the page behind the panel
No search form or locale selector within the megamenu
